        Transformer:
        Suffles the positions into the table Precondition:

      • playingFirst

        public void playingFirst(int p1_dice,
                         int p2_dice)
        Transformer:
        Each player roll the dice. If p1 dice is greater than p2 dice then p1 is playing first otherwise player 2 plays first Precondition:
        p1 != p2 Postcondition:
        gives the turn to player 1 or player 2
        Parameters:
        p1_dice - p1 dice
        p2_dice - p2 dice

      • isThursday

        public int isThursday(Player p,
                      int bet)
        Observer:
        Parameters:
        p - the player that is on a Thursday position
        bet - the bet from the player
        Returns:
        returns 2 if the player wins money, 1 if he gets money back and 0 if he lose his money

      • isSunday

        public boolean isSunday(Player p,
                        int bet)
        Observer:
        Parameters:
        p - the player that is on a Thursday position
        bet - the bet from the player
        Returns:
        returns true if the player wins money, otherwise false
